text: (c) Use Euler’s method to obtain on approximation of y(1), solution of the I.V.P. (1) at x=1. Use a constant step size h = 1. Solution: Euler’s algorithm writes, assuming (2, yx) known, as: T =k R Yerr = Yk + R (@ uk) = vk + 1 2k(1+ 30). Then we have: k| 2k | Yk 0[-10 1[0 [yi=yo+o(d+yy)=0+-1=-1 21 [pp=p+a(l+y)=-1 Solution: y(1) ~yy = —1.
